title: Plex
description: Plex is known for its vibrant brand colors, 'E5A00D' which is a warm, golden hue symbolizing innovation, and '282A2D', a sophisticated dark shade representing stability. These colors are prominently featured in its marketing and user interface, reinforcing its identity in the media streaming industry. The information about these colors can be verified from the official Plex style guide at the source URL.
